answers.answer: I did both of those tests and failed. I have gestational diabetes and having a really hard time managing it. Have to check my sugar 4 times a day and it's always over what it should be. I changed my diet and only drink water and been counting my carbs as best I can. Next step for me is the insulin pill. Find out next week if they are going to put me on it.  Just want my baby and me to be ok.  Can't remember my numbers for the test but if you didn't pass you should find out that day. Good luck to you!
How did you get the diabetes?
I have my 1 hr glucose exam on friday and im scared I eat alot of sweets D;
I had to do three hour came out fine
Sometimes it just happens, I didn't have it with my other 2 kids so I was pretty shocked when I found out I have it. Good luck to you
I failed the 1hr test but I passed the 3 hr one

I fell my 1 hr, and go back tomorrow for the  3 hr! Mine came back at 156, that morning I did the 1 hr, I had cereal for breakfast, idk if that could affect my sugar levels! I just pray I don't have diabetes
Cereal could affect it, especially if it is a sugary cereal. Also milk has sugar in it as well.
I wonder if cereal is the reason! I really hope so!!!

question: Who got asked to go back and do the 3 hr gt because you fell the 1 hr?? And what were your numbers?
title: 3 hr glucose test!!??
